actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection

official_title: To provide for grants to States for enacting statewide laws regulating public playgrounds consistent with with playground safety guidelines established by the Consumer Product Safety Commission.

summary.text: Safe Playgrounds Act - Directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to provide grants to upgrade public playgrounds in States that have enacted a statewide law regulating public playgrounds in accordance with Commission guidelines.

titles.title: To provide for grants to States for enacting statewide laws regulating public playgrounds consistent with with playground safety guidelines established by the Consumer Product Safety Commission.
